name: Void Staff
passive: Dissolve: Magic damage ignores 40% of the target's Magic Resist.
description: Item that provides Ability Power. Passive effect: Magic damage ignores 40% of the target's Magic Resist.. A versatile item that can benefit many champion types.
tips: Essential against teams building magic resistance
The percentage penetration scales well into late game
Great for maintaining damage relevance as MR increases
Consider building this as a second or third item on mages
Particularly effective when enemies have over 100 MR
